table-wrap.anchoringText: A set of variables was chosen for evaluation via sensitivity analysis: perforated interval and injection rate are parameters that can be selected, while vertical-to-horizontal permeability ratio, gas-liquid relative permeability endpoints and critical gas saturation are uncertain reservoir parameters. The response to gas production rates, bottom-hole pressures (BHP) and breakthrough times was determined. Tables 1 to 3 summarize the cases studied for the most critical parameters identified.
table-wrap.label: Table 1
table-wrap.caption: Cases evaluated for perforated thickness at the injector well

formatted-caption.caption-text: Cases evaluated for perforated thickness at the injector well
